: : Rodimus Prime : :
   
  Rodimus chuckled at the bickering/discussion.
   
  Rodimus: The only bots on the planet that I'm sure would know are in the Predacon ranks unfortunately. Maybe if we call up Megatron...
   
  Rodimus smiles at his small joke.
  

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
    "hmm... interesting.  Then I guess we'll just have to check what he says against our database...  Do you know anyone who does know him that we could talk to?" asked Salveo.
   
  "Nice....Nice.... you haven't even met the guy and already you're getting paranoid...." said Ravenchief.
   
  "Hey, I don't like being tricked.  So I'm going to be suspicious of any new person.....or would you rather we just let anyone in?"
   
  "You didn't seem so suspicious of Rodimus...."
   
  "....He's Rodimus Prime!"
   
  ".....so?"
   
  "....... this is different...."
   
  "How so?"
   
  "........."
   
  "I guess you just go by instinct in these cases..." added Guardia sarcastically.
   
  "Fine.... I'll give this guy a chance... but if I see one hint of betrayal...."
   
  "You'll what?" asked Ravenchief.
   
  "I'll lock him up...."
   
  "Such a friendly disposition Salveo has...."

 
  On 11/22/05, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:     : : Rodimus Prime : :
   
  Rodimus waves his hand to dismiss the idea.
   
  Rodimus: If this Optimal Optimus is the Optimus Primal who was the Axalon's CO, I wouldn't know. I never met him. We were in two different Beats Wars.
    

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
    Ravenchief entered the meeting room.
   
  "That was quick..." said Guardia in sort of immature way.
   
  "What do you mean?" asked Ravenchief.
   
  "...sigh.... you never did have much patience." she said to herself, loudly so that she could be heard.
   
  Ravenchief glared at her, then sat down in an empty seat.  Guardia and Ravenchief were always arguing as if they were siblings.  They had known eachother for a long time and Salveo had learned to stay out of their disputes. 
   
  "I don't know if you talked to anyone else, but you came just in time to meet our new guest."
   
  "Huh?" Ravenchief's interest was perked.
   
  "Yes... his name is Optimal Optimus.  According to our records, that name was used by a Maximal leader in the Beast Wars.  I'm uncertain if this will be the same one, but I'm sure Rodimus will be able to tell us." 
   
  "hmmmm...." replied Ravenchief.
   
  They sat there in silence and waited for other's to come.

 
  On 11/17/05, rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:   OOC: this topic is located at the Pasificus Base in Atlantis   

  On 11/17/05, airly2000 <airly2002@... > wrote:   SPire:

"So" said the femme"Other legendary Maximal leader appears????"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, rm2kmidi <kraftlos@g...> wrote:
>
> Salveo then hit a button on the radio and called Lord Perseus. 
>  "Perseus. Go ahead" replied Perseus over the radio. 
>  "We just recieved a maximal named Optimal Optimus. I'm having one
of the
> troopers lead him to the meeting room. I just thought you should 
know."
>  "No problem... the more the merrier. Just make sure he 
understands our
> policies and the policies of Atlantis. We have enough trouble as
it is with
> these Unicronians. Thanks for keeping me up to date... Perseus 
out..."
>  The radio buzzed and clicked off. The room was somewhat silent 
again...
>
